title: How to Apply for ID-One
context: Follow these steps to apply for your iD-One digital identity

eligibility.title: Eligibility Requirements
requirements: Access to a smartphone with camera

steps.title: Download the Tradelink Sign Mobile App
steps.context: Available on iOS App Store and Google Play Store

steps.title: Prepare Your Documents and Activation Code
steps.context: Have your e-passport ready for scanning. Input activation code {code} in the App.

steps.title: Complete Identity Verification
steps.context: Take a selfie and scan your e-passport for verification

processTime.title: Processing Time
processTime.body: Your iD-One application will typically be processed within 5 minutes. You'll receive an email confirmation once approved.
